name: TheEssenceofTea
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Essence of Tea provides daily information about tea, tips and tricks, health benefits, history and more. Owner and founder of Sipping Streams Tea Company, Jenny Tse, is an eleven time international award winning tea specialist. Jenny will be sharing about her life experiences and tea knowledge with you daily.
So if you're a tea fanatic or are wanting to learn more about tea, this is the Alexa skill for you!

Make sure you check out www.sippingstreams.com to learn more about tea. Feel free to suggest a topic too! Also, follow Sipping Streams Tea Company Facebook, Twitter & Instagram @sippingstreams. There is also a Sipping Streams Youtube Channel with great information about tea.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
